name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance applications and machine learning solutions. Proficient in **Python** and **C++**, with hands-on expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing **transformers**, **GANs**, and various MLOps strategies. Experienced in deploying scalable architectures using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, and implementing CI/CD pipelines for efficient model training and serving.
Skilled in voice conversion, ASR, vocoders, and source separation techniques, with a strong foundation in speaker diarization and diffusion methods. Proven track record in compliance-driven development, with attention to HIPAA and SOC 2 standards, ensuring secure and reliable ML solutions. Adept at leveraging tools like **torchscript** and **onnx** for optimizing model deployment, and implementing advanced strategies like flow-matching and LoRA for enhanced performance.
